{{ $title := .Params.seo_title | default (partial "funcs/title.html" .) }} {{ if and .Parent .Parent.Params.page_title_format }} {{ $title = printf .Parent.Params.page_title_format $title }} {{ end }} {{ if not .IsHome }} {{ $title = printf "%s - %s" $title $.Site.Params.page_title_suffix }} {{ end }} {{ return $title }}
